rules: {"rules":[{"conditions":{"any":[{"all":[{"fact":"gameDuration","operator":"equal","value":40},{"fact":"personalFoulCount","operator":"greaterThanInclusive","value":5},{"fact":"gameMonth","operator":"in","value":{"fact":"inSeason"}}]},{"all":[{"fact":"gameDuration","operator":"equal","value":48},{"fact":"personalFoulCount","operator":"greaterThanInclusive","value":6}]}]},"event":{"type":"fouledOut","params":{"message":"Player has fouled out!"}}},{"conditions":{"all":[{"fact":"account-information","operator":"equal","value":"microsoft","path":"$.company"},{"fact":"account-information","operator":"equal","value":"terminated","path":"$.status"}]},"event":{"type":"microsoft-terminated-employees","params":{"message":"Employee has been terminated as employee of Microsoft"}}},{"conditions":{"all":[{"fact":"employee-tenure","operator":"greaterThanInclusive","value":10,"params":{"unit":"years"}}]},"event":{"type":"ten-year-tenure","params":{"message":"Employee has ten years or more of employement."}}}]}
